title: Predict H1N1 and Seasonal Flu Vaccines
description: Predict whether people received H1N1 and seasonal flu vaccines using information they shared about their backgrounds, opinions, and health behaviors, using DrivenData datasets and using various models.

title: Personal Book Recommendations System
description: A personalized recommendation system that uses my reading preferences and history to suggest me books. The dataset was scrapped from French websites into CSV file.

title: Automated Summarization of Long Documents
description: Developing and evaluating automated summarization models to effectively summarize long documents. The best model combines traditional and advanced Transformer-based approaches.
